Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class SocketClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.SocketClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnection, Runnable
public class SocketClientConnection extends Object implements Runnable, ClientConnection
SocketClientConnection is a ClientConnection that handles the socket connection with the client by sending and reading messages through the socket.
See Also:
  • ClientConnection
